lines.text:
[turning down a cigarette]
Can't, they smell your breath.
Then we better not listen to this music, they may listen to your ears.
Swing Heil! Swing Heil, Peter! Swing Heil!
How's this for a cover? HJs by day, Swing Kids by night?
We can't let them split us apart.
Look who we have here, Peter's priss. Have you talked to her yet?
Who says I'm interested?
Your tongue was on the floor.
How do I look?
Like gold.
You can't listen to this and not dance!
I would rather belong to any one... ANYONE, than belong to the Nazis like you do.
That's because you have everything backwards. Nazis go anywhere they want, do anything they want, everyone gets out of our way.
Quiz time. Got your glasses on.
What?
It means you don't know who your friends are.
You're turning into a fucking Nazi!
Oh so WHAT if I AM?
If you side with the Nazis, Thomas, then we're at war.
Tain't what you do it's the way that you do it. Tain't what you do it's the way that you do it. Tain't what you do it's the way that you do it. That's what gets me through.
Ma ma ma ma!

How I envy the young. For them everything is so clear. Things seem to be either one way or another. It is only with a little age that you begin to see life as a series of compromises. But even in compromising one must draw a line.
Lesson's over, swing heine.
Hey! It don't mean a thing if it ain't got that swing. Do wah, do wah, do wah, do wah, do wah.
No one who likes swing can become a Nazi.
[Peter has been arrested]
Such a waste. So much passion, for nothing.
It don't mean a thing, if it ain't got that swing! Do wop do wop
[Peter is taken away]
You think that just because you're not doing it yourself, you're not a part of it? Well, I'm sick and tired of doing my part.
I'm a cowboy, and you're a pansy.
I am not a traitor. I just wised up. You will too.
I know who my friends are. I'm not alone.
You said they'd never split us apart.
You call us pansies. Even my girlfriend doesn't wear a hair that long.
Comfort is the curse of age.
You can still get Count Basie... they probably think he's the head of some country.
